pages.text: Said to gather the souls and ghosts of the noblest of departed animals, much of their wisdom may be found in its leaves.$(br2)The heat of a pyre is not enough to rekindle this herb.$(br2)Special care and $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$() are required to reach through to the fey realm and pluck a single leaf.

pages.name: Spirit Herb
pages.text: The closest plant cognate in our world is the humble beetroot.$(br2)Using $(l:crafting/runic_shears)runic shears$(), you can harvest the beetroot crop and simultaneously reaching through to the fey realm, exchanging it for spirit herb.$(br2)Once obtained, it becomes a $(l:herbs/spirit_herb#renew)renewable$() crop.
Once extracted, the seeds of the spirit herb can be planted on any farmland that can support normal crop growth.$(br2)When mature, the intertwined leaves of the plant turn a bright green.
